def add_quadratic_features(X):
    X_expanded = np.zeros((X.shape[0], 6))
    X_expanded[:,0], X_expanded[:,1] = X[:,0],X[:,1]
    X_expanded[:,2], X_expanded[:,3]= X[:,0]**2, X[:,1]**2
    X_expanded[:,4], X_expanded[:,5] = X[:,0]*X[:,1], np.ones(X.shape[0])
    
    return X_expanded
